entry.title: Home
entry.summary: This Site contains links to the NZQA and TKI websites to help find the info for NCEA easily, as well as supporting material for NZGrapher. To see the old materials that used to be on here go to https://old.mathsnz.com and https://students.mathsnz.com. The resources there are…
entry.content:
This Site contains links to the NZQA and TKI websites to help find the info for NCEA easily, as well as supporting material for NZGrapher. To see the old materials that used to be on here go to https://old.mathsnz.com and https://students.mathsnz.com. The resources there are no longer being maintained, but are provided as is, where is, if anyone still does want to use them.

My wife Olivia and I have also created a site that covers the Base Maths Concepts Linked to the Learning Progression Framework. This is a free resource for anyone to use to help them with their planning and teaching.

If you see any errors on this site please let me know.

Things I get asked frequently:
  • Do you have info on the datasets on NZGrapher?
  • How does NZGrapher produce its time series graphs?
  • Why does residuals plots have 'fitted' on the x axis?
  • What effect does sample size have on bootstrapping?
  • What happens when I can't paste? (Clipboard Access)
Other Random Things
  • Margin of Error Simulator

entry.title: NCEA Info
entry.summary: This page has links to all the info on the different NCEA Standards, including links to NZQA for the standard, clarifications, and exemplars; and to TKI for the conditions of assessment and senior secondary achievement objectives. If you are looking for old exemplars Jamie Sneddon's…
entry.content:
This page has links to all the info on the different NCEA Standards, including links to NZQA for the standard, clarifications, and exemplars; and to TKI for the conditions of assessment and senior secondary achievement objectives. If you are looking for old exemplars Jamie Sneddon's site is where to go.

Looking for info on the New Standards? Go to ncea.education.govt.nz

  • NCEA Level 1
  • NCEA Level 2
  • NCEA Level 3
